title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: When creating a new package using the New Package Wizard, a confusing message is displayed.
OB: When creating a new package using the New Package Wizard, a confusing message is displayed.
EB: When creating a new package using the New Package Wizard, a clear and concise message should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the project.
3. Open the New Package Wizard.
